Bindings.Binding: if SpawnonMoveButton:GetChecked() == true then SpawnonMoveButton:SetChecked(false) OPMasterTable.Options["SpawnOnMove"] = false else SpawnonMoveButton:SetChecked(true) OPMasterTable.Options["SpawnOnMove"] = true end

if OPMoveObjectInstead:GetChecked() == true then OPMoveObjectInstead:SetChecked(false) OPMasterTable.Options["MoveObject"] = false RelativeToPlayerToggle:Disable() else OPMoveObjectInstead:SetChecked(true) OPMasterTable.Options["MoveObject"] = true RelativeToPlayerToggle:Enable() end

if RelativeToPlayerToggle:GetChecked() == true then RelativeToPlayerToggle:SetChecked(false) OPMasterTable.Options["RelativeToPlayer"] = false else RelativeToPlayerToggle:SetChecked(true) OPMasterTable.Options["RelativeToPlayer"] = true end
